/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, painted in vibrant hues of red and orange, stand tall against the clear blue sky. Their facades are adorned with Chinese characters, adding a touch of cultural richness to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details and the lively atmosphere of the street.
